rooms.name: entrance_hall
rooms.description: Entrance hall with foyer design to welcome guests. Features a central area that directs towards the courtyard, aligning with Vastu principles for positive energy.

rooms.name: living_room
rooms.description: Open living space adjacent to the entrance hall, offering access to the main balcony overlooking the courtyard. Balcony design emphasizes Kerala style wooden grills and traditional motifs.

rooms.name: kitchen
rooms.description: Modular kitchen designed with modern amenities integrated in a traditional aesthetic; includes ample storage following local design norms.

rooms.name: dining_room
rooms.description: A cozy dining area with seating arrangements, placed near the living room for easy accessibility.

rooms.name: central_courtyard
rooms.description: Central open courtyard designed as a communal space and focal point; adheres to Vastu principles by promoting natural light and air circulation.

rooms.name: bedroom1
rooms.description: Primary bedroom with an attached spacious balcony featuring traditional Kerala-style railing. Positioned in the north-east as per Vastu guidelines for enhanced well-being.

rooms.name: bedroom2
rooms.description: Secondary bedroom with a private balcony, ensuring privacy and adherence to regional design standards.

rooms.name: bathroom1
rooms.description: Master bathroom for Bedroom1 incorporating modern fixtures and traditional Kerala design elements.

rooms.name: bathroom2
rooms.description: Bathroom adjoining Bedroom2, ensuring convenience with a minimalist approach.

rooms.name: gym_area
rooms.description: Private gym located in an accessible area of the ground floor; features compact, multi-functional exercise equipment and mirrors designed for space efficiency while maintaining Kerala aesthetics.

openings.details: Main entrance with decorative archways in traditional Kerala style
Large casement windows on the balcony providing ample natural light and ventilation
Spacious balcony extending from the living room, offering outdoor relaxation space with traditional design
